duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide remote, telehealth services to adolescent and young adult clients through individual, family, and group therapy.
Maintain availability for group sessions and individual/family sessions, with flexibility for evenings and Saturdays.
Integrate a variety of modalities (DBT, CBT, EMDR, MI certification) into treatment approach.
Utilize cloud-based communication software, Gmail, Slack, Zoom, Dropbox, and EMR & outcomes survey software on a daily basis.
Participate in case discussions, collaborate with other clinicians, and develop strong relationships with clients.
Access free, online CEUs to meet licensing requirements and explore topics of interest.
Work 100% remotely from anywhere in the USA.

education_certification.credential: Licensed mental health or substance use counselor (all disciplines are welcome to apply). Master's degree in mental health or related field.
